abstract: Navy commander Jose Luis Sanchez pleads guilty in federal court in San Diego to bribery and conspiracy in large scheme involving Asian military contractor.
lead_paragraph: A Navy commander has pleaded guilty to bribery and conspiracy in a huge scheme involving a military contractor in Asia.
snippet: A Navy commander has pleaded guilty to bribery and conspiracy in a huge scheme involving a military contractor in Asia.
